body: Candidatul ideal:Technical university or college degreeExperience in automotive industryExperience in multicultural environment and working in accordance with international standardsGood knowledge of quality systemsExcellent communication skills in EnglishDriving license (cat. B.) with driving experienceDynamic, strong personality with excellent contact building skillsCustomer orientated, business approach LoyaltyFlexibilityDescrierea jobului:Active role in the continuous development of the site's activities, discovering new business opportunities, contacting potential partners.Planning, managing and controlling the activity of the site under her/his responsibility.Planning, coordinating and managing the projects and services defined by the top management for the site under her/his responsibility.Planning, ensuring and coordinating the resources necessary for the efficient operation of the region.Providing a high level and high quality service for the customers; continuously assessing the customers’ expectations conciliating with the contact persons, keeping professional contact with the representatives of the partners.Participating in the business procedures required by the company’s inner regulations.Preparing the necessary analysis and reports for both the partners and for her/his superior and for the other areas of our organization to provide up-to-date information.
title: Site Manager
